subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: adaptiveLayout
subMembers.description: Specifies adaptive layout properties.

subMembers.name: annotations
subMembers.description: Specifies the annotation collection.

subMembers.name: name
subMembers.description: Specifies the annotation's name.

subMembers.name: argumentAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies [argument axis] properties for the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: argumentType
subMembers.description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

subMembers.name: axisDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring major ticks in pixels. Applies only to the axes of the *"continuous"* and *"logarithmic"* [types].

subMembers.name: categories
subMembers.description: Specifies the order of categories on an axis of the *"discrete"* [type].

subMembers.name: constantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the argument axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: displayBehindSeries
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

subMembers.name: extendAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to extend the axis to display the constant line.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to be displayed in a constant line label.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies a value to be displayed by a constant line.

subMembers.name: firstPointOnStartAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to display the first point at the angle specified by the [startAngle] property.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the elements that will be highlighted when the argument axis is hovered over.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a label on the argument axis.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by argument axis labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis labels.

subMembers.name: linearThreshold
subMembers.description: Specifies a value used to calculate the range on a [logarithmic axis] within which the axis should be linear. Applies only if the data source contains negative values or zeroes.

subMembers.name: logarithmBase
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for a [logarithmic axis].

subMembers.name: shift
subMembers.description: Shifts minor ticks from the reference position.

subMembers.name: minorTickCount
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of minor ticks between two neighboring major ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies the interval between minor ticks.

subMembers.name: originValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be used as the origin for the argument axis.

subMembers.name: period
subMembers.description: Specifies the period of the argument values in the data source.

subMembers.name: startAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies the angle in arc degrees to which the argument axis should be rotated. The positive values rotate the axis clockwise.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a strip.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies an end value for a strip.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed in a strip.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies a start value for a strip.

subMembers.name: strips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis strips.

subMembers.name: shift
subMembers.description: Shifts ticks from the reference position.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between axis ticks/grid lines.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the required type of the argument axis.

subMembers.name: barGroupPadding
subMembers.description: Controls the padding and consequently the angular width of a group of bars with the same argument using relative units. Ignored if the [barGroupWidth] property is set.

subMembers.name: barGroupWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies a fixed angular width for groups of bars with the same argument, measured in degrees. Takes precedence over the [barGroupPadding] property.

subMembers.name: commonAnnotationSettings
subMembers.description: Specifies settings common for all annotations in the PolarChart.

subMembers.name: allowDecimals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the axis. When **false**, the axis contains integer values only.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the line that represents an axis.

subMembers.name: commonAxisSettings
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties that are common for all [axes] of the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a constant line.

subMembers.name: constantLineStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance of all the UI component's constant lines.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for a constant line.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for a constant line label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not to display labels for the axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies a constant line width in pixels.

subMembers.name: discreteAxisDivisionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether ticks/grid lines of a discrete axis are located between labels or cross the labels.

subMembers.name: endOnTick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to force the axis to start and end on ticks.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for grid lines.

subMembers.name: grid
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for the [grid lines] of an [axis] in the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies an opacity for grid lines.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not the grid lines of an axis are visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of grid lines.

subMembers.name: inverted
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not an axis is inverted.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for axis labels.

subMembers.name: indentFromAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies the spacing between an axis and its labels in pixels.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining the [label] configuration properties that are common for all axes in the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: overlappingBehavior
subMembers.description: Decides how to arrange axis labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not axis labels are visible.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for the lines of the minor grid.

subMembers.name: minorGrid
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the minor grid.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies an opacity for the lines of the minor grid.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the minor grid is visible or not.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies a width for the lines of the minor grid.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies minor tick length.

subMembers.name: minorTick
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies an opacity for the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not the minor ticks are displayed on an axis.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies minor tick width.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the line that represents an axis.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for a strip label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for a strip label style.

subMembers.name: stripStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for [strip] style.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies ticks color.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies tick length.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies tick opacity.

subMembers.name: tick
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for [axis ticks].

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not ticks are visible on an axis.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies tick width.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not the line that represents an axis in a chart is visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the line that represents an axis in the chart.

subMembers.name: area
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the *area* type in the chart.

subMembers.name: bar
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _bar_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: commonSeriesSettings
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties that are common for all series of the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: line
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _line_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: scatter
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _scatter_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: stackedbar
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _stackedBar_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Sets a series type.

subMembers.name: containerBackgroundColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the parent page element.

subMembers.name: customizeAnnotation
subMembers.description: Customizes an individual [annotation].

subMembers.name: checkTypeForAllData
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to validate the values from a data source.

subMembers.name: convertToAxisDataType
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to convert the values from a data source into the data type of an axis.

subMembers.name: dataPrepareSettings
subMembers.description: An object providing properties for managing data from a data source.

subMembers.name: sortingMethod
subMembers.description: Specifies how to sort the series points.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by legend items.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what series elements to highlight when a corresponding item in the legend is hovered over.

subMembers.name: legend
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of a chart's legend.

subMembers.name: negativesAsZeroes
subMembers.description: Forces the UI component to treat negative values as zeroes. Applies to stacked-like series only.

subMembers.name: resolveLabelOverlapping
subMembers.description: Specifies how the chart must behave when [series point labels] overlap.

subMembers.name: series
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for PolarChart UI component [series].

subMembers.name: seriesSelectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a single series or multiple series can be selected in the chart.

subMembers.name: customizeSeries
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns a [series] object with individual series settings.

subMembers.name: nameField
subMembers.description: Specifies a data source field that represents the series name.

subMembers.name: seriesTemplate
subMembers.description: Defines properties for the series template.

subMembers.name: useSpiderWeb
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to display a "spider web".

subMembers.name: axisDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient for dividing the value axis.

subMembers.name: categories
subMembers.description: Specifies the order of categories on an axis of the *"discrete"* [type].

subMembers.name: constantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the value axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: displayBehindSeries
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

subMembers.name: extendAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to extend the axis to display the constant line.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to be displayed in a constant line label.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies a value to be displayed by a constant line.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a label on the value axis.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in value axis labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis labels.

subMembers.name: linearThreshold
subMembers.description: Specifies a value used to calculate the range on a [logarithmic axis] within which the axis should be linear. Applies only if the data source contains negative values or zeroes.

subMembers.name: logarithmBase
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for a logarithmic axis.

subMembers.name: maxValueMargin
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient that determines the spacing between the maximum series point and the axis.

subMembers.name: minValueMargin
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient that determines the spacing between the minimum series point and the axis.

subMembers.name: minVisualRangeLength
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum length of the [visual range].

subMembers.name: minorTickCount
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of minor ticks between two neighboring major ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies the interval between [minor ticks].

subMembers.name: showZero
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to indicate a zero value on the value axis.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a strip.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies an end value for a strip.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed in a strip.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies a start value for a strip.

subMembers.name: strips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis strips.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between axis ticks/grid lines.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the required type of the value axis.

subMembers.name: valueAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies [value axis] properties for the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: valueMarginsEnabled
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to display series with indents from axis boundaries.

subMembers.name: valueType
subMembers.description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

subMembers.name: visualRange
subMembers.description: Defines the axis' displayed range. Cannot be wider than the [wholeRange].

subMembers.name: visualRangeUpdateMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how the axis's [visual range] should behave when the PolarChart data is updated.

subMembers.name: wholeRange
subMembers.description: Defines the range where the axis can be zoomed.

subMembers.name: AreaSeries
subMembers.description: An object defining a series of the **area** type.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to the series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects the series.

subMembers.name: BarSeries
subMembers.description: An object defining a series of the **bar** type.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to the series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects the series.

subMembers.name: CommonPolarChartSeries
subMembers.description: An object that defines configuration properties for polar chart series.

subMembers.name: argumentField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data source field that provides arguments for series points.

subMembers.name: barPadding
subMembers.description: Controls the padding and consequently the angular width of all bars in a series using relative units. Ignored if the [barWidth] property is set.

subMembers.name: barWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies a fixed angular width for all bars in a series, measured in degrees. Takes precedence over the [barPadding] property.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: An object defining the series border configuration properties.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for a series.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of series points.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets border visibility for a series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for a series in pixels.

subMembers.name: closed
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to close the chart by joining the end point with the first point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a series color.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the dash style of the series' line.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the series elements to highlight when a series is hovered over.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: An object defining the border properties for a hovered series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for a hovered series.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets a border visibility for a hovered series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for a hovered series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a color for a series when it is hovered over.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the dash style for the line in a hovered series.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight the hovered series.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Specifies the hatching properties to be applied when a series is hovered over.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: highlight
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to lighten the series when a user points to it.

subMembers.name: hoverStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for a hovered series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of a line in a hovered series.

subMembers.name: ignoreEmptyPoints
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the series should ignore null data points.

subMembers.name: argumentFormat
subMembers.description: Formats the point argument before it is displayed in the point label. To format the point value, use the [format] property.

subMembers.name: backgroundColor
subMembers.description: Colors the point labels' background. The default color is inherited from the points.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Specifies border properties for point labels.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a border color for point labels.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether borders are visible in point labels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the border width for point labels.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of label connectors.

subMembers.name: connector
subMembers.description: Specifies connector properties for series point labels.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not label connectors are visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of label connectors.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by point labels.

subMembers.name: displayFormat
subMembers.description: Specifies the label's text.

subMembers.name: font
subMembers.description: Specifies font properties for the text displayed in point labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in a point label.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining the [label] configuration properties.

subMembers.name: position
subMembers.description: Specifies a label position in bar-like series.

subMembers.name: rotationAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies the angle used to rotate point labels from their initial position.

subMembers.name: showForZeroValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to show a label when the point has a zero value.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies the visibility of point labels.

subMembers.name: maxLabelCount
subMembers.description: Specifies how many points are acceptable to be in a series to display all labels for these points. Otherwise, the labels will not be displayed.

subMembers.name: minBarSize
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimal length of a displayed bar in pixels.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies opacity for a series.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: Specifies border properties for points in the line and area series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for points in the line and area series.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets border visibility for points in the line and area series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for points in the line or area series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the points color.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what series points to highlight when a point is hovered over.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: An object defining the border properties for a hovered point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for a hovered point.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets border visibility for a hovered point.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for a hovered point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a color for a point when it is hovered over.

subMembers.name: hoverStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for a hovered point.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the diameter of a hovered point in the series that represents data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the height of an image that is used as a point marker.

subMembers.name: image
subMembers.description: An object specifying the parameters of an image that is used as a point marker.

subMembers.name: url
subMembers.description: Specifies a URL leading to the image to be used as a point marker.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of an image that is used as a point marker.

subMembers.name: point
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for [points] in line and area series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what series points to highlight when a point is selected.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: An object defining the border properties for a selected point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for a selected point.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets border visibility for a selected point.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for a selected point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a color for a point when it is selected.

subMembers.name: selectionStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for a selected point.

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the diameter of a selected point in the series that represents data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).

subMembers.name: size
subMembers.description: Specifies the point diameter in pixels for those series that represent data points as symbols (not as bars for instance).

subMembers.name: symbol
subMembers.description: Specifies a symbol for presenting points of the line and area series.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies the points visibility for a line and area series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the series elements to highlight when the series is selected.

subMembers.name: border
subMembers.description: An object defining the border properties for a selected series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a border color for a selected series.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for the borders of point labels.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Sets border visibility for a selected series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Sets a border width for a selected series.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Sets a color for a series when it is selected.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the dash style for the line in a selected series.

subMembers.name: direction
subMembers.description: Specifies how to apply hatching to highlight a selected series.

subMembers.name: hatching
subMembers.description: Specifies the hatching properties to be applied when a series is selected.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of hatching lines.

subMembers.name: step
subMembers.description: Specifies the distance between hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of hatching lines in pixels.

subMembers.name: highlight
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to lighten the series when a user selects it.

subMembers.name: selectionStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for a selected series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of a line in a selected series.

subMembers.name: showInLegend
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to show the series in the chart's legend.

subMembers.name: stack
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the stack where the values of the _stackedBar_ series must be located.

subMembers.name: tagField
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the data source field that provides data about a point.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of error bars.

subMembers.name: displayMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether error bars must be displayed in full or partially.

subMembers.name: edgeLength
subMembers.description: Specifies the length of the lines that indicate error bar edges.

subMembers.name: highValueField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides data for high error values.

subMembers.name: lineWidth
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the error bar line.

subMembers.name: lowValueField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data field that provides data for low error values.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of error bars.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies how error bar values must be calculated.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be used for generating error bars.

subMembers.name: valueErrorBar
subMembers.description: Configures error bars.

subMembers.name: valueField
subMembers.description: Specifies the data source field that provides values for series points.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Specifies the visibility of a series.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies a line width.

subMembers.name: LineSeries
subMembers.description: An object defining a series of the **line** type.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to the series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects the series.

subMembers.name: ScatterSeries
subMembers.description: An object defining a series of the **scatter** type.

subMembers.name: Series Types
subMembers.description: This section lists objects that define properties used to configure series of specific types.

subMembers.name: StackedBarSeries
subMembers.description: An object defining a series of the **stackedBar** type.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user points to the series.

subMembers.name: selectionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies series elements to be highlighted when a user selects the series.

subMembers.name: Point
subMembers.description: This section describes the **Point** object, which represents a series point.

subMembers.name: Fields
subMembers.description: Fields that provide information on the series.

subMembers.name: axis
subMembers.description: Returns the name of the value [axis] of the series.

subMembers.name: Series
subMembers.description: This section describes the **Series** object, which represents a series.

properties.name: dxPolarChart
properties.description: The PolarChart is a UI component that visualizes data in a polar coordinate system.

Methods.name: resetVisualRange()
Methods.description: Resets the value axis' [visual range] to the data range or to the [whole range] if it is within the data range.

Events.name: onArgumentAxisClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a [label] on the [argument axis] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onDone
Events.description: A function that is executed when all series are ready.

Events.name: onDrawn
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component's rendering has finished.

Events.name: onExported
Events.description: A function that is executed after the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is exported.

Events.name: onFileSaving
Events.description: A function that is executed before a file with exported UI component is saved to the user's local storage.

Events.name: onIncidentOccurred
Events.description: A function that is executed when an error or warning occurs.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onLegendClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a [legend item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: onPointClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a series point is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onPointHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a series point.

Events.name: onPointSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a series point is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onSeriesClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a [series] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onSeriesHoverChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after the pointer enters or leaves a series.

Events.name: onSeriesSelectionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed when a series is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: onTooltipHidden
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip becomes hidden.

Events.name: onTooltipShown
Events.description: A function that is executed when a tooltip appears.

Events.name: onZoomEnd
Events.description: A function that is executed when zooming or panning ends.

Events.name: onZoomStart
Events.description: A function that is executed when zooming or panning begins.

Events.name: argumentAxisClick
Events.description: Raised when a [label] on the [argument axis] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: legendClick
Events.description: Raised when a [legend item] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: seriesClick
Events.description: Raised when a [series] is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: seriesHoverChanged
Events.description: Raised after the pointer enters or leaves a series.

Events.name: seriesSelectionChanged
Events.description: Raised when a series is selected or selection is canceled.

Events.name: zoomEnd
Events.description: Raised when zooming or panning ends.

Events.name: zoomStart
Events.description: Raised when zooming or panning begins.

subMembers.name: AdaptiveLayout
subMembers.description: Specifies adaptive layout properties.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container height at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum container width at which the layout begins to adapt.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies [argument axis] properties for the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: argumentType
subMembers.description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

subMembers.name: axisDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum distance between two neighboring major ticks in pixels. Applies only to the axes of the *"continuous"* and *"logarithmic"* [types].

subMembers.name: categories
subMembers.description: Specifies the order of categories on an axis of the *"discrete"* [type].

subMembers.name: constantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the argument axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: firstPointOnStartAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to display the first point at the angle specified by the [startAngle] property.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies the elements that will be highlighted when the argument axis is hovered over.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis labels.

subMembers.name: linearThreshold
subMembers.description: Specifies a value used to calculate the range on a [logarithmic axis] within which the axis should be linear. Applies only if the data source contains negative values or zeroes.

subMembers.name: logarithmBase
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for a [logarithmic axis].

subMembers.name: minorTick
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickCount
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of minor ticks between two neighboring major ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies the interval between minor ticks.

subMembers.name: originValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be used as the origin for the argument axis.

subMembers.name: period
subMembers.description: Specifies the period of the argument values in the data source.

subMembers.name: startAngle
subMembers.description: Specifies the angle in arc degrees to which the argument axis should be rotated. The positive values rotate the axis clockwise.

subMembers.name: strips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis strips.

subMembers.name: tick
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for axis ticks.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between axis ticks/grid lines.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the required type of the argument axis.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [argumentAxisClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisConstantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the argument axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: displayBehindSeries
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

subMembers.name: extendAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to extend the axis to display the constant line.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies a value to be displayed by a constant line.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisConstantLinesLabel
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to be displayed in a constant line label.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisLabel
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis labels.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a label on the argument axis.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by argument axis labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

subMembers.name: shift
subMembers.description: Shifts minor ticks from the reference position.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisStrips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for argument axis strips.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a strip.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies an end value for a strip.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies a start value for a strip.

subMembers.name: ArgumentAxisStripsLabel
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed in a strip.

subMembers.name: shift
subMembers.description: Shifts ticks from the reference position.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettings
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties that are common for all [axes] of the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: allowDecimals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to allow decimal values on the axis. When **false**, the axis contains integer values only.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies the color of the line that represents an axis.

subMembers.name: constantLineStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance of all the UI component's constant lines.

subMembers.name: discreteAxisDivisionMode
subMembers.description: Specifies whether ticks/grid lines of a discrete axis are located between labels or cross the labels.

subMembers.name: endOnTick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to force the axis to start and end on ticks.

subMembers.name: inverted
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not an axis is inverted.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining the [label] configuration properties that are common for all axes in the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: minorTick
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies the opacity of the line that represents an axis.

subMembers.name: stripStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for [strip] style.

subMembers.name: tick
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for [axis ticks].

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not the line that represents an axis in a chart is visible.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the line that represents an axis in the chart.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsConstantLineStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies the appearance of all the UI component's constant lines.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a constant line.

subMembers.name: dashStyle
subMembers.description: Specifies a dash style for a constant line.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies a constant line width in pixels.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsConstantLineStyleLabel
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not to display labels for the axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsLabel
subMembers.description: An object defining the [label] configuration properties that are common for all axes in the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: indentFromAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies the spacing between an axis and its labels in pixels.

subMembers.name: overlappingBehavior
subMembers.description: Decides how to arrange axis labels when there is not enough space to keep all of them.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not axis labels are visible.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsMinorTick
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies minor tick length.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies an opacity for the minor ticks.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not the minor ticks are displayed on an axis.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies minor tick width.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsStripStyle
subMembers.description: An object defining configuration properties for [strip] style.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for a strip label style.

Types.name: CommonAxisSettingsStripStyleLabel
Types.description: An object defining the configuration properties for a strip label style.

subMembers.name: CommonAxisSettingsTick
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for [axis ticks].

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies ticks color.

subMembers.name: length
subMembers.description: Specifies tick length.

subMembers.name: opacity
subMembers.description: Specifies tick opacity.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not ticks are visible on an axis.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies tick width.

subMembers.name: CommonSeriesSettings
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties that are common for all series of the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: area
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the *area* type in the chart.

subMembers.name: bar
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _bar_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: line
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _line_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: scatter
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _scatter_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: stackedbar
subMembers.description: An object that specifies configuration properties for all series of the _stackedBar_ type in the chart.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Sets a series type.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DoneEvent
Types.description: The type of the [done] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DrawnEvent
Types.description: The type of the [drawn] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exported] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ExportingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: FileSavingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [fileSaving] event handler's argument.

Types.name: IncidentOccurredEvent
Types.description: The type of the [incidentOccurred] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: Legend
subMembers.description: Specifies the properties of a chart's legend.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a legend item.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed by legend items.

subMembers.name: hoverMode
subMembers.description: Specifies what series elements to highlight when a corresponding item in the legend is hovered over.

subMembers.name: LegendClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [legendClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PointClickEvent
Types.description: The type of the [pointClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PointHoverChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [pointHoverChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PointSelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [pointSelectionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: SeriesClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [seriesClick] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SeriesHoverChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [seriesHoverChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: SeriesSelectionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [seriesSelectionChanged] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: shared
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the tooltip is shared across all series points with the same argument.

Types.name: TooltipHiddenEvent
Types.description: The type of the [tooltipHidden] event handler's argument.

Types.name: TooltipShownEvent
Types.description: The type of the [tooltipShown] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ValueAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies [value axis] properties for the PolarChart UI component.

subMembers.name: axisDivisionFactor
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient for dividing the value axis.

subMembers.name: categories
subMembers.description: Specifies the order of categories on an axis of the *"discrete"* [type].

subMembers.name: constantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the value axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: endOnTick
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to force the axis to start and end on ticks.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis labels.

subMembers.name: linearThreshold
subMembers.description: Specifies a value used to calculate the range on a [logarithmic axis] within which the axis should be linear. Applies only if the data source contains negative values or zeroes.

subMembers.name: logarithmBase
subMembers.description: Specifies the value to be raised to a power when generating ticks for a logarithmic axis.

subMembers.name: maxValueMargin
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient that determines the spacing between the maximum series point and the axis.

subMembers.name: minValueMargin
subMembers.description: Specifies a coefficient that determines the spacing between the minimum series point and the axis.

subMembers.name: minVisualRangeLength
subMembers.description: Specifies the minimum length of the [visual range].

subMembers.name: minorTickCount
subMembers.description: Specifies the number of minor ticks between two neighboring major ticks.

subMembers.name: minorTickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies the interval between [minor ticks].

subMembers.name: showZero
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to indicate a zero value on the value axis.

subMembers.name: strips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis strips.

subMembers.name: tick
subMembers.description: An object defining the configuration properties for axis ticks.

subMembers.name: tickInterval
subMembers.description: Specifies an interval between axis ticks/grid lines.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the required type of the value axis.

subMembers.name: valueMarginsEnabled
subMembers.description: Indicates whether to display series with indents from axis boundaries.

subMembers.name: valueType
subMembers.description: Specifies the desired type of axis values.

subMembers.name: visualRange
subMembers.description: Defines the axis' displayed range. Cannot be wider than the [wholeRange].

subMembers.name: visualRangeUpdateMode
subMembers.description: Specifies how the axis's [visual range] should behave when the PolarChart data is updated.

subMembers.name: wholeRange
subMembers.description: Defines the range where the axis can be zoomed.

subMembers.name: ValueAxisConstantLines
subMembers.description: Defines an array of the value axis constant lines.

subMembers.name: displayBehindSeries
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the constant line behind or in front of the series.

subMembers.name: extendAxis
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to extend the axis to display the constant line.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: Specifies a value to be displayed by a constant line.

subMembers.name: ValueAxisConstantLinesLabel
subMembers.description: An object defining constant line label properties.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to be displayed in a constant line label.

subMembers.name: ValueAxisLabel
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis labels.

subMembers.name: customizeHint
subMembers.description: Specifies the text for a hint that appears when a user hovers the mouse pointer over a label on the value axis.

subMembers.name: customizeText
subMembers.description: Specifies a callback function that returns the text to be displayed in value axis labels.

subMembers.name: format
subMembers.description: Formats a value before it is displayed in an axis label.

subMembers.name: ValueAxisStrips
subMembers.description: Specifies properties for value axis strips.

subMembers.name: color
subMembers.description: Specifies a color for a strip.

subMembers.name: endValue
subMembers.description: Specifies an end value for a strip.

subMembers.name: label
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: startValue
subMembers.description: Specifies a start value for a strip.

subMembers.name: ValueAxisStripsLabel
subMembers.description: An object that defines the label configuration properties of a strip.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed in a strip.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Indicates whether or not ticks are visible on an axis.

Types.name: ValueAxisVisualRangeUpdateMode
Types.description: Specifies how the axis's [visual range] should behave when the PolarChart data is updated.

subMembers.name: ZoomEndEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [zoomEnd] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ZoomStartEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [zoomStart] event handler's argument.
